mapper.select: select movie_id, movie_title, poster_path from ( select row_number() over(order by R.rating_date desc) AS rno , M.movie_id, M.movie_title, M.poster_path from movie M right join star_rating R on M.movie_id = R.movie_id where user_id = #{user_id} order by rating_date desc ) A where A.rno between 1 and 5

select b.user_id, b.nickname, b.profile_message, b.profile_image , A.avg_rating, A.count_rating from ( select user_id, round(avg(rating),2) as avg_rating, count(rating) as count_rating from star_rating where user_id = #{user_id} group by user_id ) A join member B on A.user_id = B.user_id
select M.movie_id, M.movie_title, M.poster_path, R.rating from movie M right join star_rating R on M.movie_id = R.movie_id where user_id = #{user_id} order by rating_date desc

select review_id, movie_id, movie_title, poster_path, review_content, review_date, spoiler_status , number_of_likes, number_of_comments from ( select row_number() over(order by R.review_date desc) AS rno , R.review_id, M.movie_id, M.movie_title, M.poster_path, R.review_content , to_char(R.review_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS review_date , R.spoiler_status, R.number_of_likes, R.number_of_comments from movie_review R join movie M on R.movie_id = M.movie_id where user_id = #{user_id} ) A where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select movie_id, movie_title, poster_path, rating from ( select row_number() over(order by R.rating_date desc) AS rno , M.movie_id, M.movie_title, M.poster_path , R.rating from movie M right join star_rating R on M.movie_id = R.movie_id where user_id = #{user_id} order by rating_date desc ) A where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select A.review_id, A.movie_id, A.review_content, A.review_date, A.spoiler_status, A.number_of_likes, A.number_of_comments , A.user_id, A.profile_image, A.nickname , decode(nvl(B.rating, 0), 0, '평가안함', 1, B.rating) AS rating from ( select row_number() over(order by R.review_date desc) AS rno , R.review_id, R.movie_id, R.review_content, R.review_date, R.spoiler_status, R.number_of_likes, R.number_of_comments , M.user_id, M.profile_image, M.nickname from movie_review R join member M on R.user_id = M.user_id ) A join star_rating B on A.movie_id = B.movie_id where A.movie_id = #{movie_id}
and rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}
